name: state_lifecycle
config:
    look: neo

stateDiagram-v2
    [Groupware_SprintBacklog] --> Initialized: __init__(Groupware_KanbanBoard)

    Initialized --> Seeded: set_seed(Groupware_WikiPage)
    
    Seeded --> Running: run(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    Initialized --> Running: run(Groupware_ChatRoom)
    
    Running --> Computing: execution complete
    Running --> Error: exception raised
    
    Computing --> Completed: stats computed
    
    Error --> Initialized: create new instance
    
    Completed --> Running: run(Groupware_WikiPage) again
    Completed --> [Groupware_SprintBacklog]: return SimulationResult
